name: Reel King Slot
description:
Spinning reels has never been this much fun! Play Reel King™ and you’ll feel like royalty, especially when the colourful winning symbols light up the reels.

Not only will the cool design of this hit slot put a smile on your face - it’s also easy to play and offers you great chances to win!

Keep your eyes peeled for the Gold Coins symbol, for it has a particularly high win value. And there’s nothing quite like seeing a little extra sparkle on the reels, right?

Moreover, Reel King™ comes complete with an extra special feature that could leave you lost for words. But we don’t want to spoil the surprise here...

Reel King™ at a glance:
- 5 reels
- Up to 20 win lines
- WILD symbols (Jokers)
- Special Reel King feature
- A chance to land winnings of up to 500x your stake

How do I get spinning at Reel King™?
It couldn’t be simpler: Get the app, register at GameTwist, and away you go. What’s more, a wide variety of further awesome games is waiting for you at GameTwist!
